name: New osu! website dark theme.
description:
osu! has been pushing out an update to the website, so I decided to make a dark theme for the site.

Keep the license in mind before you copy this stylesheet =)
additional_info:
Please note that the update has been happening for less than 4 hours at the point of writing this.

So please be patient if anything looks bad on your end, it may be something that wasn't even implemented when I made this stylesheet.

Check back every once in a while as I will be updating this CSS regularily until I am happy with it.

Version history:

1.1:
-Fixed the color of the .well class

1.0:
-First version -May have some visual imperfections, but seemed pretty solid to me
